tool_description:
This API converts one English word into a Japanese word and generates a Japanese style image.
It uses a get method and returns the image directly so it is very easy to use.
name: KanjiPicGenerator
title: KanjiPicGenerator

api_list.name: wahuKanji
api_list.description: one english word you want to make kanji. Clouds, moon, autumn leaves are randomly arranged.
